divs: Sighting DetailsAs a F16 like jet just shook my house I decided to report the event that took place at 8:20pm on April 12, 2012.. I looked outside and saw the jet insanely low making a sharp turn toward NYC .. As for what I witnessed earlier... Driving home south on the garden state parkway (exit158)I happened to be looking East when a blue green streak came out of nowhere and shot on a vertical ellipse leaving a streak across the sky. It must of been a total of 3 seconds. I was so taken back I stopped talking to a friend who I was on the phone with. Not a shooting star or a meteor shower ...nothing like it.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Paramus
There were no other sightings in Paramus on or around April 12th 2012
Summary: Blue Green Streak in the sky near Paramus NJ..
